main.name: Thabisile Obi
main.description: Revealing the secrets of data to construct data-driven solutions
main.bio: I am a data science enthusiast who uses various analytical skills and tools to solve problems through critical and creative thinking for innovating ideas. As a hardworking, self-driven and enthusiastic woman, I pride myself on my ability to solve problems and produce data-driven guidance.
main.contactmessage: Contact me for collaborations, contracts and freelancing gigs.

resume.skillmessage: My academic studies have enabled me to gain exposure to qualitative research, critical thinking and writing skills. I have also developed quantitative skills, which include data analysis, model development and performing statistical analyses. The zest for solving problems with data leads me to the ideal career path in Data Science.

education.degree: MSc in Data Science and Financial Technology

education.description: Received distinction in Research Methodology and partial scholarship from the University of Pretoria

work.title: Tutor
work.description: Tutored struggling, average and advanced students in Politics and International Relations - 5 classes a week with approximately 9 - 25 students in a class
